I'm with this ^^^ guy. If someone can even upload an un-cracked iso, I know a little bit about cracking, and know a few people who know a lot about cracking, so I may be able to get it cracked and re-upload the cracked version.

Setup is really simple.
Just install (allow auto updates), once installed, it'll ask you to update to version 1.1.0.4, do it. Run the game using AGRI-CULT-URAL-SIMU as the registration key, then play.
Works great with my GeForce 9800 GTX+ at almost max graphics settings. Default controls are messy and need customization, and there's still some minor bugs to work out, but the game works and is better than Farming Simulator by a huge margin. The fact that you now have a reason to work and have risks in getting your stuff damaged and have a lot more variety in everything just makes Farming Simulator a joke. Plus the graphics and level of details in everything is far superior.
Thank you for uploading this. :)

After playing for an hour... The game doesn't allow me to go in reverse with the cheapest tractor (the reverse lights become a strobe light) and my chickens don't show up anywhere (I had bought 500 chickens in 2 compartments or w/e and none of them showed up, but the cows showed up. Refueling is no big deal once you've figured it out, and the tractors consume a ridiculous amount of gas (runs out after like 10 minutes of driving). There's also some minor bugs in the buildings. I can't seem to do any damage to the tractor itself, but I'm sure the add-on stuff would take damage.
AGRI-CULT-URAL-SIMU you can play with that serial but you  will have lot's of errors.
